synthesis_conditions.temperature: Room temperature for mixing, then stored at -15 degrees Celsius
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Deprotonation of 2 with a fivefold excess of LiOtBu leads to a homogeneous yellow solution that slowly deposited crystals of 1.

starting_materials: Residue from the preliminary synthesis of complexes 5-7
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The residue was dissolved in methanol, filtered, and layered with THF before refrigeration.

starting_materials: Residue from the preliminary synthesis of complexes 5-7
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The residue was dissolved in ethanol, filtered, and allowed to stand.

starting_materials: Residue from the preliminary synthesis of complexes 5-7
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The residue and 1,1-bis(4-hydroxyphenyl)methane were dissolved in ethanol, filtered, and allowed to stand.
